Protected Member Functions

Status SetStatus (Status status) const

Detailed Description

The GraphicsPath stores a sequence of lines, shapes, and curves. The entire sequence can be drawn at once using the Graphics::DrawPath method.

Status AggOO::GraphicsPath::AddQuadratics ( const Point *  points,
INT  count 
)

Add a sequence of quadratic curves to the path

Remarks:
Each quadratic spline is made of 3 points. The first and last points are the end-points, and the second is the control point. When adding multiple splines, the third point of the previous spline is used as the first point of the current spline. In other words, the first 3 points in the array are used for the first spline, the next 2, along with the last point from the first spline, are used for the second spline, and so on.

Status AggOO::GraphicsPath::AddQuadratics ( const PointF *  points,
INT  count 
)

Add a sequence of quadratic curves to the path

Remarks:
Each quadratic spline is made of 3 points. The first and last points are the end-points, and the second is the control point. When adding multiple splines, the third point of the previous spline is used as the first point of the current spline. In other words, the first 3 points in the array are used for the first spline, the next 2, along with the last point from the first spline, are used for the second spline, and so on.

Status AggOO::GraphicsPath::AddBeziers ( const Point *  points,
INT  count 
)

Add a sequence of bezier curve to the path

Remarks:
Each bezier spline is made of 4 points. The first and fourth points are the end-points, and the second and third are the control points. When adding multiple splines, the fourth point of the previous spline is used as the first point of the current spline. In other words, the first 4 points in the array are used for the first spline, the next 3, along with the last point from the first spline, are used for the second spline, and so on.

Status AggOO::GraphicsPath::AddBeziers ( const PointF *  points,
INT  count 
)

Add a sequence of bezier curve to the path

Remarks:
Each bezier spline is made of 4 points. The first and fourth points are the end-points, and the second and third are the control points. When adding multiple splines, the fourth point of the previous spline is used as the first point of the current spline. In other words, the first 4 points in the array are used for the first spline, the next 3, along with the last point from the first spline, are used for the second spline, and so on.

Status AggOO::GraphicsPath::Transform ( const Matrix *  matrix  ) 

Get an array of points and point types that define the path Get an array of the path's points. The points are the end points and control points of the lines and bezier curves. Get an array of point types used in the path Get the number of points in the path's array of data points. This is the same as the number of point types. Reverse the order of the points that define this path Transform the path by a given matrix
